overview: It is a fact that couples who SWING together STAY together. From outrageous sexual dares to parties where the outcum is anything but assured, Private's Swingers stars horny housewives Bella Beretta, Susana Melo, Ava Courcelles, Christen Courtney, Lynna Nilsson and Ash Hollywood. These wives' well hung hubbies understand their needs and together live out their wildest sexual fantasies. Whether you fancy a saucy French cougar, a blonde beauty or a red headed firecracker, Private's Swinger parties are guaranteed to cater for your every need!
title: Swingers
